attributes.action: Stockport MBC to arrange procession for Stockport County’s promotion.
attributes.additional_details: The council should arrange the main A6 outside the town hall to be closed so that an open top bus procession can take place, this is a fantastic achievement that needs celebrating! It will also help local businesses.
attributes.background: The fall of Stockport County from the football league is a disgrace, Stockport council should be helping the town celebrate the achievement of Stockport county gaining promotion to the national league and one step closer back to the football league.
